column5: Hi all, This was the lake on 11th Mayhttp://youtu.be/FDFJUYyue2EAnd this was yesterday evening 13th Mayhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bKWlEjwFGSg Ice going really fast now, should be somewhere fishable by boat( depending on which way the wind is blowing) by opener.
Great video, looks like you will be able to launch a boat anyways, ive got a open lake also so all, s good.just need fish to cooperate.
Awesome, looks like by midweek there will be plenty of open water around, weekend after most lakes around here i fish will be good to go.
This is amazing. How thick was the ice on the 11th and 12th before this happened?

Well i managed to stand on it on the 11th, got a boot full of water getting onto the ice though. But that day was sunny and hot, next day torrential rain. I'd say the ice was around 10inches thick on the 11th, sun did a real number on it then a ton of rain and 25kmh winds moved the all that honeycomb ice with ease.
